bilingual.source: He tends to abuse his power when given authority.
bilingual.target: 他在被赋予权力时往往会滥用权力。

bilingual.source: The abuse of public power can lead to social injustice.
bilingual.target: 公权力的滥用会导致社会不公。

bilingual.source: The abuse of ice can lead to serious health problems.
bilingual.target: 冰毒的滥用会导致严重的健康问题。

bilingual.source: Abuse of cocaine can lead to addiction and other issues.
bilingual.target: 可卡因的滥用会导致成瘾和其他问题。

bilingual.source: Separation of powers helps prevent the abuse of government power.
bilingual.target: 三权分立有助于防止政府滥用权力。

bilingual.source: The government is taking measures to control opioid abuse.
bilingual.target: 政府正在采取措施控制阿片类药物的滥用。

bilingual.source: The movie depicts the devastating effects of heroin abuse.
bilingual.target: 这部电影描述了海洛因滥用的毁灭性影响。

bilingual.source: Some people abuse their privileges, causing problems for others.
bilingual.target: 有些人滥用他们的特权，给他人带来麻烦。

bilingual.source: It's important not to abuse the trust others place in you.
bilingual.target: 重要的是不要滥用他人对你的信任。

bilingual.source: The manager warned the staff not to abuse the company's resources.
bilingual.target: 经理警告员工不要滥用公司的资源。

list.abstract: abuse（英 [əˈbjuːs , əˈbjuːz]，美 [əˈbjuːs , əˈbjuːz]），英语单词，作动词为滥用；妄用；虐待。作名词为滥用；妄用；虐待。例句：She spat abuse at the jury.（她气势汹汹地辱骂陪审团。） abuse的近义词有punishment、vice等。

yingyinNormal.en: But what prevents the abuse of power?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但有什么能防止权力滥用呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Let me tell you a story about the abuse of drugs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来告诉你一个滥用毒品的故事吧。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Even if I did think that was a good idea, I'm not gonna abuse my position of power in the school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，即便我认为那是个好主意，我也不能滥用我在学校里的职权。

yingyinNormal.en: And we thought you would be best to discern a pattern of abuse here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们认为这里是最能分辨滥用职权倾向的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: You yourself have investigated the White House for abuse of power. It forced a president to resign.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你本人就曾调查过白宫滥用职权的案件，最后迫使时任总统辞了职。

yingyinNormal.en: The theft of resources, the general incompetence, the abuse of their children.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们是资源的掠夺者，缺乏实力，还虐待自己的孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps the most heinous example of cellphone abuse is ringing in the theater. What temerity!
yingyinNormal.zh: 手机泛滥带来最糟糕的后果，应该就是大大影响剧场演出。那真是失礼的行为！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, listen you guys. I have this friend at Bloomingdales who's quitting tomorrow and he wants to abuse his discount.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有朋友在布鲁明戴尔百货上班，明天就不干了，他想要花掉他的折扣券。

yingyinNormal.en: But he has no idea what an idiot you are! Is this merely stream-of-consciousness abuse, or are you attempting to make a point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他不知道你有多蠢！你是在意识流地诛心，还是想表达什么观点？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: use something to bad effect or for a bad purpose

examination_example.sentence: By the time a problem has been addressed and remedied it may have vanished in the marketplace, to be replaced by new <highlight>abuses</highlight> of power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当一个问题得到解决时，它可能已经在市场中消失了，取而代之的是新的权力滥用。

word_usage.usage:
be open to abuse表示 “容易被滥用”，如：
The legal system is open to abuse.
这种法律制度容易被钻空子。
The system of paying cash bonuses is open to abuse. 
支付现金红利制度可能被人钻空子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 虐待者；滥用者；酗酒者；嗜毒者；性侵犯者

word_family.mean: v. 滥用；妄用；虐待；辱骂；诋毁；伤害；性侵犯；摧残；过度使用

sense_info_list.en: use something to bad effect or for a bad purpose

examination_example.sentence: AMSAT operates on the principle of having all its technical data accessible to its members, preventing the <highlight>abuse</highlight> of amateur satellites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: AMSAT的运作原则是其成员可以获得其所有技术数据，防止滥用业余卫星。

examination_example.sentence: Experts believe there is a relationship between adult <highlight>abuse</highlight> of legitimate medicines and the drug culture that has swept our country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专家认为，成年人滥用合法药物与席卷我国的毒品文化之间存在联系。

examination_example.sentence: From other sources, we also know teenage crime, drug <highlight>abuse</highlight> and premarital sex are in general decline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从其他来源，我们也能知道青少年犯罪、药物滥用和婚前性行为普遍下降。

sense_info_list.en: treat a person or an animal with cruelty or violence, especially regularly or repeatedly

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 滥用; 虐待; 辱骂

examination_example.sentence: “The Ickabog is a story about truth and the <highlight>abuse</highlight> (滥用) of power,” Rowling wrote on the website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗琳在网站上写道:“《伊克博格》是一个关于真相和权力滥用的故事。”

examination_example.sentence: Children who eat a main meal with their families are also less likely to <highlight>abuse</highlight> drugs and alcohol (吸毒酗酒).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和家人一起吃主餐的孩子也不太可能滥用毒品和酒精。
